amendment.description: Amendment sought to specify that no Child Survival and Disease Program funds may be used for activities designed to control fertility or reduce or delay childbirths or pregnancies (except breastfeeding programs).
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment printed in H.Rept. 106-269 that specifies that no Child Survival and Disease Program funds may be used for activities designed to control fertility or reduce or delay childbirths or pregnancies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 353).
